item.sql: SELECT DISTINCT vmi_cus_number AS cus_number, vmi_pid AS pid, vmi_id AS id, vmi_name AS name, vmi_type AS type, vmi_icon_url AS icon_url, vmi_host_key AS host_key, vmi_status AS status, vmi_order AS "order", vmi_is_default AS is_default, vmi_model_group_id AS model_group_id, vmi_pos_x AS pos_x, vmi_pos_y AS pos_y, vmi_pos_z AS pos_z, vmi_rot_x AS rot_x, vmi_rot_y AS rot_y, vmi_rot_z AS rot_z, vmi_tar_x AS tar_x, vmi_tar_y AS tar_y, vmi_tar_z AS tar_z, vmi_area_id AS area_id FROM map_view_menu_info
item.where: WHERE vmi_cus_number = ? AND vmi_is_default = 1
WHERE vmi_cus_number = ?
WHERE vmi_cus_number = ? AND vmi_area_id IN (SELECT oar_area_id FROM com_org_area_rltn WHERE oar_cus_number = ? AND oar_dept_id = ?)
START WITH vmi_cus_number = ? AND vmi_area_id IN (SELECT oar_area_id FROM com_org_area_rltn WHERE oar_cus_number = ? AND oar_dept_id = ?) CONNECT BY PRIOR vmi_id = vmi_pid

START WITH vmi_cus_number = ? AND vmi_area_id IN (SELECT oar_area_id FROM com_org_area_rltn INNER JOIN TABLE(dvc_pkg_permission.getdep(?, ?, ?)) ON oar_dept_id = odd_id) CONNECT BY PRIOR vmi_id = vmi_pid

item.sql: SELECT mfi_cus_number AS cus_number, mfi_file_id AS id, mfi_file_pid AS pid, mfi_file_title AS name, mfi_file_flag AS type, mfi_file_name AS model_name, mfi_file_order AS "order" FROM map_model_file_info
item.where: WHERE mfi_cus_number = ?

item.sql: SELECT mpi_cus_number, mpi_point_id, mpi_point_name, mpi_view_id, mpi_link_type, mpi_link_id, mpi_model_type, mpi_pos_x, mpi_pos_y, mpi_pos_z, mpi_rot_x, mpi_rot_y, mpi_rot_z, mpi_point_flag, mpi_show_type, mpi_distance_min, mpi_distance_max, mpi_line_height, mpi_icon_url, mpi_text_font, mpi_text_color, mpi_text_bgcolor, mpi_view_pos_x, mpi_view_pos_y, mpi_view_pos_z, mpi_view_rot_x, mpi_view_rot_y, mpi_view_rot_z, mpi_view_tar_x, mpi_view_tar_y, mpi_view_tar_z, mpi_rltn_model_name FROM map_model_point_info
item.where: WHERE mpi_cus_number = ? AND mpi_point_flag = ? AND mpi_show_type #> 4
WHERE mpi_cus_number = ? AND mpi_view_id = ? AND mpi_point_flag = ? AND mpi_show_type #> 4
WHERE mpi_cus_number = ? AND mpi_link_type = ? AND mpi_link_id = ?

item.desc: 根据用户授权查询地图模型点位
item.sql: SELECT mpi_cus_number, mpi_point_id, mpi_point_name, mpi_view_id, mpi_link_type, mpi_link_id, mpi_model_type, mpi_pos_x, mpi_pos_y, mpi_pos_z, mpi_rot_x, mpi_rot_y, mpi_rot_z, mpi_point_flag, mpi_show_type, mpi_distance_min, mpi_distance_max, mpi_line_height, mpi_icon_url, mpi_text_font, mpi_text_color, mpi_text_bgcolor, mpi_view_pos_x, mpi_view_pos_y, mpi_view_pos_z, mpi_view_rot_x, mpi_view_rot_y, mpi_view_rot_z, mpi_view_tar_x, mpi_view_tar_y, mpi_view_tar_z, mpi_rltn_model_name FROM map_model_point_info WHERE ((NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT das_cus_number, das_dvc_type, das_dvc_id FROM com_dvc_auth_set WHERE das_user_id = :userId AND das_dvc_type #> 2) WHERE das_cus_number = mpi_cus_number AND das_dvc_id = mpi_link_id AND das_dvc_type = mpi_link_type) AND mpi_link_type #> 2) OR (((SELECT COUNT(0) FROM com_dvc_auth_set WHERE das_cus_number = :cusNumber AND das_dvc_type = 2 AND das_user_id = :userId) = 0 OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT das_cus_number, das_dvc_type, das_dvc_id FROM com_dvc_auth_set WHERE das_user_id = :userId AND das_dvc_type = 2) WHERE das_cus_number = mpi_cus_number AND das_dvc_id = mpi_link_id AND das_dvc_type = mpi_link_type)) AND mpi_link_type = 2))
item.where: AND mpi_cus_number = :cusNumber AND mpi_point_flag = :pointFlag AND mpi_show_type #> 4
AND mpi_cus_number = :cusNumber AND mpi_point_flag = :pointFlag AND mpi_view_id = :viewId AND mpi_show_type #> 4
AND mpi_cus_number = :cusNumber AND mpi_link_type = :linkType AND mpi_link_id = :linkId

where.desc: 根据三维巡视路线配置点位查询

item.where: AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM map_route_device_link WHERE rdl_cus_number = :cusNumber AND rdl_route_id = :routeId AND rdl_dvc_type = mpi_link_type AND rdl_dvc_id = mpi_link_id))

item.sql: SELECT pgg_power_grid_id AS power_grid_id, pgg_line_color AS line_color, pgg_line_width AS line_width, pgg_electricity_color AS electron_color, pgg_show_elect AS show_elect FROM map_power_grid_geom
item.where: WHERE pgg_cus_number = ?

item.sql: SELECT pgp_power_grid_id AS power_grid_id, pgp_pos_x AS pos_x, pgp_pos_y AS pos_y, pgp_pos_z AS pos_z FROM map_power_grid_points
item.where: WHERE pgp_cus_number = ?

item.sql: SELECT mcl_cus_number AS cus_number, mcl_load_id AS load_id, mcl_load_mode AS load_mode, mcl_view_id AS view_id, mcl_pos_x AS pos_x, mcl_pos_y AS pos_y, mcl_pos_z AS pos_z, mcl_rot_x AS rot_x, mcl_rot_y AS rot_y, mcl_rot_z AS rot_z, mcl_mci_id AS mci_id, mci_class AS class_flag, mci_type AS type_flag FROM map_model_component_load INNER JOIN map_model_component_info ON mci_cus_number = mcl_cus_number AND mci_id = mcl_mci_id WHERE mcl_cus_number = ?
item.where: AND mcl_load_mode = ?
AND mcl_load_mode = ? AND mcl_view_id = ?

item.sql: SELECT omg_id, omg_origin_name AS a_name, omg_destination_name AS b_name, omr_a_dvc_id AS a_dvc_id, omr_a_dvc_type AS a_dvc_type, omr_b_dvc_id AS b_dvc_id, omr_b_dvc_type AS b_dvc_type FROM map_orbit_move_master LEFT JOIN map_orbit_move_rltn ON omg_cus_number = omr_cus_number AND omg_id = omr_omg_id WHERE omg_cus_number = :cusNumber
item.where: AND ((omg_origin_name = :aName AND omg_destination_name = :bName) OR (omg_destination_name = :aName AND omg_origin_name = :bName))

AND ((omr_a_dvc_type = :aDvcType AND omr_a_dvc_id = :aDvcId AND omr_b_dvc_type = :bDvcType AND omr_b_dvc_id = :bDvcId) OR (omr_b_dvc_type = :aDvcType AND omr_b_dvc_id = :aDvcId AND omr_a_dvc_type = :bDvcType AND omr_a_dvc_id = :bDvcId))

item.sql: SELECT omp_cus_number, omp_omg_id, omp_pos_x, omp_pos_y, omp_pos_z, omp_seq FROM map_orbit_move_points WHERE omp_cus_number = ?
item.where: AND omp_omg_id = ?
AND omp_omg_id IN (SELECT column_value FROM table(CDS_PKG_COMMON_FUNC.CDS_F_SPLIT_DATA(?,',')))

item.sql: SELECT ppi_cus_number AS cus_number, ppi_point_id AS point_id, ppi_view_id AS view_id, ppi_panel_width AS panel_width, ppi_panel_height AS panel_height, ppi_link_type AS link_type, ppi_link_id AS link_id, ppi_pos_x AS pos_x, ppi_pos_y AS pos_y, ppi_pos_z AS pos_z, ppi_point_flag AS point_flag, ppi_distance_min AS dis_min, ppi_distance_max AS dis_max, prisoner.pbd_other_id AS prsnr_code, prisoner.pbd_prsnr_name AS prsnr_name, photo.pbd_photo_path AS photo_path, abi_bed_code AS bed_code, abi_bed_name AS bed_name FROM map_panel_point_info INNER JOIN psr_prisoner_base_dtls prisoner ON prisoner.pbd_cus_number = ppi_cus_number AND prisoner.pbd_prsnr_id = ppi_link_id AND ppi_link_type = 98 LEFT JOIN psr_photo_base_dtls photo ON photo.pbd_cus_number = prisoner.pbd_cus_number AND photo.pbd_prsnr_id = prisoner.pbd_prsnr_id AND photo.pbd_photo_type = 0 LEFT JOIN psr_bed_base_dtls ON bbd_cus_number = prisoner.pbd_cus_number AND bbd_prsnr_id = prisoner.pbd_prsnr_id LEFT JOIN com_area_bed_info ON bbd_cus_number = abi_cus_number AND bbd_bed_id = abi_bed_id
item.where: WHERE ppi_cus_number = ? AND ppi_view_id = ?

item.sql: SELECT lpi_cus_number, lpi_point_id, lpi_link_type, lpi_link_id, lpi_show_text, lpi_show_icon, lpi_line_height, lpi_dis_min, lpi_dis_max, lpi_pos_x, lpi_pos_y, lpi_pos_z, lpi_point_type, lpi_view_id, lpi_bind_model, lpi_view_pos_x, lpi_view_pos_y, lpi_view_pos_z, lpi_view_rot_x, lpi_view_rot_y, lpi_view_rot_z, lpi_view_tar_x, lpi_view_tar_y, lpi_view_tar_z FROM map_label_point_info
item.where: WHERE lpi_cus_number = ?
WHERE lpi_cus_number = ? AND lpi_view_id = ? AND lpi_point_type = ?
